name: Mental Run
description:
An infinite runner set in a mental asylum... The Idea is to create a Realistic Infinite Runner, With a horror theme. I will Complete the project if I get enough funding. But I will still be updating regularly. Don't Worry even 0.1$ help. Support me as much as you can or want to.

-Leaderboards

-Unreal Visuals

-Bad sound(please Donate)

Disclaimer: This game will be in active development for a few months. Tell whatever you like or dislike about the game, as well as bugs. the game was made by only one high school student, so go easy on me. I will also be adding features to the game that the community suggests.

In Progress:

-Sound design: I need a bit of money to make the sound design really what I want it to be.

-Settings Menu: Will be done within the first 2 weeks of release.

-Realistic Animations: Depends on the reception. Will implement more fluid animations and motion.

-More props and obstacles: The game currently has 3, I will be adding them through out the games life span. (Suggestions needed)

-Better Graphics: I am currently working on a few better materials and models that will be implemented soon.

-Optimization: Will be done through out games life span.
